EmailTemplate.subject: Mandatory Masks – We’re in this together!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
In these uncertain times, I hope you and your loved ones are staying safe and healthy.
Due to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, Quebec has made masks mandatory in all indoor public spaces and I know many businesses are struggling to adjust. If your business is one of them, I just wanted to reach out and let you know that Grand & Toy currently has a large inventory of face masks to support your needs. Our masks have gone through rigorous testing to ensure high quality and compliance with Canadian health standards.
As a business, you’re under additional scrutiny to ensure masks or face coverings are being worn in your space, because Quebec has made it the business’s responsibility to enforce the new regulation – i.e. businesses need to ensure employees and visitors are provided with masks or they could face fines of up to $6000. To help, we’ve discounted our masks and are offering 3 boxes for $99.99 for a limited time.
If you have any questions or would like to place an order, please feel free to reach out.
Best Regards,
Sylvie Leroux Directrice de compte | Account Manager
